reviewText: this Divas Dvd most definatley topped last years. they had a good shoot the divas were hotter than h e doulbe hockey sticks i mean bikkinis are out lingrie is totally in. i wish they took all the christy hemme matches out and replace them with the divas battle royal from the eddie gurrero tribute raw and the divas tag team match when candice michelle has a wardrobe malfuction

This is an improvement over last year's, thanks partly to the theme. After so many bikini DVD's, seeing the ladies in lingere was a nice new theme and it's cool seeing them shooting around New York. Each lady is profiled along with shots of them in the ring, interviews and more. Even better is some of the interviews are in character, like Maria being a ditz and Melina being a haughty spotlight hog.

There are more matches, mostly from RAW although I do wish they'd included the Divas battle royal from the Eddie Guerrero tribute RAW, which was pretty good. Also surprised that they didn't have the Lita/Edge wedding where they teased a Matt Hardy appearance. However, overall, this is a pretty good way to look at the ladies of WWE. Just a shame they decided to dump Christy Hemme's stuff when she left the company.

I just watched this last night and although I haven't seen every bit of it, from what I've seen so far, it's hot.  All the divas are posing in lingerie and it's basically just like the other WWE divas dvds.  The girls talk about how they are(some of them do kind of act in character from tv, Melina talks about her "paparazzi," Candice talks about being too hot for tv, etc)  and while they're doing that, they show clips from tv and sexy poses from the girls.  The girls also talk about some of the stuff they wear and then they show them wearing it and it's really hot.  If your a WWE diva fan, all the girls are hot looking, but most noticeably you should check out Mickie James, Melina, Candice, Torrie, and Trish.  The extras are decent too, one of them is the Stacy vs Christy lingerie pillow fight from Smackdown, another nice extra is this one where Lita talks trash to Matt Hardy and she unzips her jacket and reveals this shirt that you can pretty much see most of her boobs.  They also have some behind the scenes stuff from Stacy Keibler in Stuff Magazine, as well as behind the scenes photoshoots for when the divas appeared for Raw & Smackdown magazines.  They also highlight the 2005 diva search, if anyone's interested.

  Overall, I think this is the second or third best WWE divas dvd.  The best ever was WWE Divas Undressed and this is tied with WWE Divas South Of The Border.  This dvd is much better than last year's shoot and I highly recommend getting it.

nice this was a nice video fast shipping...very cool very sexy i watch it every night what else? i don't know it was nice

This would be the last WWE Divas dvd they would do (at least for the time being) which is sad because this was a great show like the last few diva dvds have been. Great video and hours of extras including the bra and panties match from the now legendary WWE Homecoming show, a match for tribute to the troops, and some lingerie pillowfights. It's a great mix of the divas from the attitude era in Trish and Lita and Torrie and a mix of the new divas (that can actually wrestle) that would rule the division for the next few years in Melina, Mickie, and Candice. Great dvd and the last of it's kind.

If you enjoy watching or owning the other wwe divas dvds.
Go see this one. Sadly this will be there last of there video series.
The divas in this dvd have Maria, Kristal, Victoria, Torrie Wilson, Ashley, Mickie James, Stacy Keibler, Sharmell, Lita, Melina, Candice Michelle and Trish Stratus.

The "WWE Divas Do New York 2006- Lingerie Edition" dvd is just fantastic for any fan of RAW's wrestling divas...it'd be nice if they could make one for every year.  The divas on this dvd are, for the most part, just incredible.  My favorites on there are definitely Candice Michelle, Mickie James, Melina, Stacy Keibler, Kristal, and Maria.  They include photo shoot sequences for each of the divas from 2005 and then include a healthy number of excellent diva matches and other tasty items...(if you're a fan of Candice Michelle like I am, then this dvd will keep you happy!).  Overall, this is probably the best of the divas dvd's available...I haven't seen any others yet.  But I probably will soon!

I bought this DVD simply because of Melina, Crystal, and of course, Trish Stratus. I love those women IN and OUT the ring !The photo shoots were good and nice to watch a little short though simply because of the number of women it had on it. This was the first and only WWE Divas DVD I have ever bought and seen so I can't compare to others, simply because I only wanted to see Melina, Crystal, Trish, and Maria. The women could have gotten a little more personal about there out of the ring real lives, but what do you expect gotta keep it PG-13 for the youngsters. Love the extras: diva matches, other diva shoots, all the of 2005 diva search footage, and mini interviews. This DVD was pretty ok to have no nudity or no real explicit content. Of course if you want that from these women you have to wait until they decide to pose for PLAYBOY like always ! You already have Candice Michelle and Torrie to enjoy it's just a waiting game for the others.

I have to agree with the guy below my review, this years Divas DVD was much better than last years. It's been a few years since there's been a lingerie photo shoot, & it's a nice change. Most of the girls shoots are on location, most notably Maria (Brooklyn Bridge), Ashley (Central Park & Times Square), Stacy (Madison Square Park), Melina (Grand Central Station), & Candice Michelle (New York City). The other girls have not-so recognizable backgrounds. Lita has a darker looking shoot, apparently taken in some subway. Trish's shoot is in a gym (very nice). Then there's some regular studio looking shoots, like Sharmell, Kristal, Mickey James, & Torrie Wilson. The best segments are Trish & Melina. Melina is a little difficult to listen to though, as she is in character, talking about 'paparazzi', & how everyone in Grand Central Station 'is there for (her)'. They might not have been there for her, but I'm sure they stayed for her. Her shoot is VERY hot. Anyway, it follows the standard Divas DVD format...mostly photo shoot, some in-ring clips.

On the Chapters menu:
left click Sharmell for a little tid-bit on the Miss Black America pageant.
left click Melina - Melina talks about taking pictures with Kane, a police dog named after the Big Red Machine.

Extras include the semi-usual Divas 'matches' (arm wrestling, pillow fights, costume contests), & 4 actual matches:

Trish vs Victoria (Womens Championship, Raw - 9/26/05)
Ashley/Trish vs Victoria/Candice/Torrie (Handicap Bra & Panties Match, Raw - 10/3/05)
Six Diva Tag Match (Raw - 10/17/05)
Santa's Little Helper Match (Tribute To The Troops, Raw - 12/19/05)

Behind the scenes magazine shoots, 2005 Diva Search weekly recaps, & a little more bonuses complete this DVD.

Again, better than last years, & recommended, but still can't top Tropical Pleasures.
